devdoc.author: AdrianTeoYC
devdoc.custom:experimental: This is an experimental contract for my consensys blockchain bootcamp.
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

DepositCompleted(uint256,address,uint256.details: Emit event when downpayment deposit is made for a property

PropertyBooked(uint256).details: Emit event when contract owner verify and complete the booking of a property

PropertyCreated(uint256).details: Emit event when a property is created in the contract

createProperty(string,uint256).details: Allow only owner of contract to create a property

params._price: is the price of this property in wei
params._roomType: is the number of bedrooms for this property

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payDeposit(uint256).details: Payable need to be made in full at one transaction with currentStatus as NEW

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

totalProperties.details: Used as a helper to iterate properties in the frontend

devdoc.title: Simple Escrow Contract to book and make a downpayment for a condominium

properties(uint256).notice: The properties' detail in the contract
